Prashant Shukla

About Myself

I am a Quality Engineer by profession with expertise in developing custom open source solutions for complex test automation problems. I have worn many feathers in 12+ years of my career including Test Automation Training, Manager, Lead, Speaker and Developer.

I identify myself as self proclaimed test evangelist. Big Jagjeet Singh fan and Sucker for Queen songs, lover of south indian food. Unorganized knowledge of trivia.

Opinionated | He / Him | Moderate | Temperate | Mister Fahrenheit
